Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Hydraulic line vibration induced fatigue. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Foreign object damage to critical surface
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 12/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta
